meta.job_title: Senior Director, Time Away From Work

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the reimagination of the time away from work associate experience.
Motivate and lead a team that supports time away from work.
Streamline processes, policies, and procedures for time away from work delivery.
Build strong relationships with key internal stakeholders to proactively partner on issues and projects.
Achieve established goals and continuously improve performance metrics.
Identify problems, collaborate, influence, and recommend solutions to resolve issues.
Adjust communication style to influence and motivate action and behaviors.
